title: Angelina Lyrics Kalakalappu Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Angelina
Singers: Krish, Dr. Burn & Mili Nair

Movie: Kalakalappu @ Masala Cafe
Music: Vijay Ebenezer
Lyricist: Pa.Vijay

Angelina oh Angelina oh ..
Angelina Angelina ...

Enuyir kaadhali nee
vey cute pannu
Neeyum naanum veru alla
irandum onnu

Solla solla adangaadhu
Alla alla kuraiyaadhu
sollapona perazhagi
kutti ponnu,chutti ponnu
very cute ponnu

I love you sollu
kattipudi muthamkodu
aedhaachum pannu

Irudhivarai ennodu kaikorthu nillu
Darling lets step together

SOlla solla vandhu vandhu
mella vaikum kaadhal
Ullukulle sollai vaithu
solla vaikum kaadhal
Sollum podhu varthaindri
kolla vaikum kaadhal
kadhale

Enna enna mayam enna
ennidathil seithaai
chinna chinna punnagayil
seithi enna sonnai
vanna vanna paarvayaale
nenjai kondu ponaai
kadhali

Oh kadhaliye ennai yedho sikirai
uyir engilum poopoovai neikirai
kadhal kadhal sugam tharum vali
valiyil arindhen ne varum vazhi

Angelina en swasame
unnakagave en nenjam
Angelina en kadhale
unnai konjava konjam (2)

Kairegai pola nee
ennodu vaazhkirai
Angelina en kadhale oh ..

Gimme gimme gimme gimme
love story
pudavai kattum penne
romba beauty
Kadhali kondaadalaam
idhu nalla thedhi
Paadhu sollivitten
nee soll meedhi

Nilavin kel amarvome
nizhal padaadha idam thoduvome

Neeyum naanum saripaathi
nitham mutham parimaai
ini vidiyum varai paniyil nanaivome
anbae ..

Thottu thottu ennai thottu
pogudhe un vasam
vittu vittu moochu vittu
aengudhe en swasam
Madhiyaana veyililum
malligai poovesam neeyadi.

Thuppataavil ennai ennai
katti vaithu kondaai
Thoongu podhu endhan vazhi
vandhu vandhu sendraai
Thoosi pattaal kannimaikul
oothivittu thandhai uyiraye

En saalaigal irupakkam poomaram
pooengilum un vaasam veesidum
penne undhan nizhal vilumidam
sorgam mannai vandhu thodumidam

Angelina en swasame
unnakagave en nenjam
Angelina en kadhale
unnai konjava konjam

Nee vandhu ponapin
enarayil veesudhe
Angelina un vaasame ...

Angelina en swasame
unnakagave en nenjam
Angelina en kadhale
unnai konjava konjam ...

Enuyir kaadhali nee
vey cute pannu
Neeyum naanum veru alla
irandum onnu

Solla solla adangaadhu
Alla alla kuraiyaadhu
sollapona perazhagi
kutti ponnu,chutti ponnu
very cute ponnu
Darling lets step together
